type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Knight Peasant
rules_text:
Reach, trample
[i]Bowrange +2[/i] – Whenever one or more Archers you control attack, Tobin deals X damage to target creature, where X is the total power of attacking Archer's you control.
[i]Villager Origins[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Tobin dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Tobin.
